      • rsaKeyFromXmlString

        public static BigInt[] rsaKeyFromXmlString(java.lang.String xml,
                                           java.lang.String[] tagNames)
                                    throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                           java.io.IOException
        Parses RSA key data from XML string.
        Parameters:
        xml - XML string containing key data
        tagNames - Tag names of components used in XML string
        Returns:
        Array of BigInts parsed from XML
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - XML parsing error
        java.io.IOException - XML parsing error

      • rsaKeyToXmlString

        public static java.lang.String rsaKeyToXmlString(java.lang.String[] tagNames,
                                                 BigInt[] values)
        Generates an XML string representation of an RSA key given its tag names and values
        Parameters:
        tagNames - Array of strings containing tag names
        values - Array of BigInts containing key values
        Returns:
        XML string representation of key

        Parameters:

        iv - AES initialization vector
        Returns:
